name: Al-Kareem
description: Al-Kareem is one of the names of Allah in Islam, which translates to 'The Generous' or 'The Bountiful'. It signifies God's abundant grace and generosity towards His creation.
summary: Originating from Arabic, Al-Kareem is derived from the root word 'k-r-m' which means to be generous or noble. In Islamic theology, this name emphasizes Allah's boundless mercy and His willingness to bestow blessings and sustenance upon His creatures without any expectation in return.
